attributes.action: Nigel Farage to be put on the honours list for a knighthood. A true Patriot
attributes.background: Nigel Farage who became a MP(Originally Tory) after seeing the corruptness within the finance /banking sector. This man has been a vital part of UKIP for years and tirelessly battled against the corruption within our Goverment and the EU. This man is a true knight of the realm and fought for freedom

rejection.details:
We can't accept your petition because it asks for someone to be nominated for an honour. 

Members of the public can nominate people for honours directly. You can find out how to nominate someone for an honour here:

https://www.gov.uk/honours
